Let's find the pattern that connects each number.

$1\underset{\blueD?}{{\rightarrow}}3\underset{\blueD?}{\rightarrow} 9 \underset{\blueD?}{\rightarrow} 27$

The pattern starts at $1$ and multiplies by $3$ each time.

$1\underset{\blueD{\times3}}{{\rightarrow}}3\underset{\blueD{\times3}}{\rightarrow} 9 \underset{\blueD{\times3}}{\rightarrow} 27$

So, if we want to know what the next number will be, we need to extend the pattern:

$\overset{\greenD1}1\underset{\blueD{\times3}}{{\rightarrow}}\overset{\greenD2}3\underset{\blueD{\times3}}{\rightarrow} \overset{\greenD3}{9} \underset{\blueD{\times3}}{\rightarrow} \overset{\greenD4} {27} \underset{\blueD{\times3}}{\rightarrow} \overset{\greenD5}{81}$
The next number in the pattern will be $81$.
